isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000i and 9000i - LIGHT SYSTEMS - DESCRIPTION - Cab Clearance and Identification Lights

svcproc.title: Cab Clearance and Identification Lights
svcproc.para: Cab identification lights function to provide quick visual identification of trucks and tractors in the dark. They are required on trucks and tractors wider than 80 inches to distinguish them from automobiles. Clearance lights are located at the widest points of the cab roof to identify the width of the vehicle.
